fw.name: CATAssemblyInterfaces

class.name: CATAsmConstraintServices
class.abstract: Class dedicated to Assembly Constraints services.

method.name: ListConstraints
method.abstract: Gets the list of constraints under a given reference product.

method.name: RefreshConstraint
method.abstract: Refreshes a constraint's status.

method.name: RefreshConstraintsInProduct
method.abstract: Refreshes the status of every constraint in a given product.

method.name: RemoveConstraint
method.abstract: Removes a constraint.

class.name: CATAsmConstraintSetServices
class.abstract: Class dedicated to Assembly Constraints' Sets creation and management.

method.name: AddNewSetChild
method.abstract: Adds a new set child to an existing set.

method.name: GetRootSet
method.abstract: Gets the Root Set associated to the given product (corresponding to the Constraints' Node).

function.name: GetCATAsmConstraintSettingCtrl
function.abstract: Returns the Assembly constraint settings controller.

function.name: GetCATAsmGeneralSettingCtrl
function.abstract: Returns the Assembly general settings controller.

class.name: CATIAsmConstraintSettingAtt
class.abstract: Interface to modify Assembly Design options.

method.name: GetConstraintCreationMode
method.abstract: Retrieves the constraint creation option.

method.name: GetConstraintCreationModeInfo
method.abstract: Retrieves the state of the constraint creation option.

method.name: GetPasteComponentMode
method.abstract: Retrieves the paste component option.

method.name: GetPasteComponentModeInfo
method.abstract: Retrieves the state of the paste component option.

method.name: GetQuickConstraintMode
method.abstract: Retrieves the quick constraint option.

method.name: GetQuickConstraintModeInfo
method.abstract: Retrieves the state of the quick constraint option.

method.name: GetQuickConstraintOrderedList
method.abstract: Retrieves the full ordered types list for quick constraint option.

method.name: GetRedundancyMode
method.abstract: Retrieves the redundancy check for constraint creation option.

method.name: SetConstraintCreationMode
method.abstract: Sets the constraint creation option.

method.name: SetConstraintCreationModeLock
method.abstract: Locks or unlocks the constraint creation option.

method.name: SetPasteComponentMode
method.abstract: Sets the paste component option.

method.name: SetPasteComponentModeLock
method.abstract: Locks or unlocks the paste component option.

method.name: SetQuickConstraintMode
method.abstract: Sets the quick constraint option.

method.name: SetQuickConstraintModeLock
method.abstract: Locks or unlocks the quick constraint option.

method.name: SetQuickConstraintOrderedList
method.abstract: Retrieves the full ordered types list for quick constraint option.

method.name: SetRedundancyMode
method.abstract: Sets the redundancy check for constraint creation option.

class.name: CATIAsmCstSetFeature
class.abstract: Interface to manage the set of constraints.

method.name: GetFatherSet
method.abstract: Give the father set.

method.name: ListCstChildren
method.abstract:
Give the list of constraints included in the set
by default the root set hold all the constraints.

method.name: ListSetChildren
method.abstract: Give the list of set child.

method.name: MoveConstraintsFrom
method.abstract: Move a list of constraints on this set from this set or another one.

method.name: MoveSetFrom
method.abstract: Move a set on this set from this set or another one.

method.name: RemoveSetChild
method.abstract: Remove a set child.

class.name: CATIAsmGeneralSettingAtt
class.abstract: Interface to modify Assembly Design options.

method.name: GetAutoSwitchToDesignMode
method.abstract: Retrieves the implicit switch from visualization mode to design mode option.

method.name: GetAutoSwitchToDesignModeInfo
method.abstract: Retrieves the state of the implicit switch from visualization mode to design mode option.

method.name: GetAutoUpdateMode
method.abstract: Retrieves the automatic update option.

method.name: GetAutoUpdateModeInfo
method.abstract: Retrieves the state of the automatic update option.

method.name: GetMoveWithFixTExtendMode
method.abstract: Retrieves the option managing the extension of a move to the components involved in a FixTogether.

method.name: GetMoveWithFixTExtendModeInfo
method.abstract: Retrieves the state of the the option managing the extension of a move to the components involved in a FixTogether.

method.name: GetUpdateStatusMode
method.abstract: Retrieves the update status computation option.

method.name: GetUpdateStatusModeInfo
method.abstract: Retrieves the state of the update status computation option.

method.name: SetAutoSwitchToDesignMode
method.abstract: Sets the implicit switch from visualization mode to design mode option.

method.name: SetAutoSwitchToDesignModeLock
method.abstract: Locks or unlocks the implicit switch from visualization mode to design mode option.

method.name: SetAutoUpdateMode
method.abstract: Sets the automatic update option.

method.name: SetAutoUpdateModeLock
method.abstract: Locks or unlocks the automatic update option.

method.name: SetMoveWithFixTExtendMode
method.abstract: Sets the the option managing the extension of a move to the components involved in a FixTogether.

method.name: SetMoveWithFixTExtendModeLock
method.abstract: Locks or unlocks the the option managing the extension of a move to the components involved in a FixTogether.

method.name: SetUpdateStatusMode
method.abstract: Sets the update status computation option.

method.name: SetUpdateStatusModeLock
method.abstract: Locks or unlocks the update status computation option.

enum.name: AutoSwitchToDesignMode
enum.abstract: Option managing the implicit switch from visualization mode to design mode.

enum.name: ExtendMoveToFixT
enum.abstract: Option managing the extension of a move to the components involved in a FixTogether.

class.name: CATIAsmSelectMove3D
class.abstract: Customized interface for compass manipulator behaviour in Assembly workbench.

class.name: CATIAssyWorkBenchAddin
class.abstract: Interface to add toolbars in the Assembly Design workbench.

class.name: CATIProdDraftingProperties
class.abstract: Interface to manage the drafting properties of a product.

method.name: GetCutStatus
method.abstract: Gets the Cut option.

method.name: GetHiddenLineMode
method.abstract: Gets the hidden lines option.

method.name: GetUseStatus
method.abstract: Gets the Use option.

method.name: SetCutStatus
method.abstract: Retrieves the Cut option.

method.name: SetHiddenLineMode
method.abstract: Retrieves the hidden lines option.

method.name: SetUseStatus
method.abstract: Retrieves the Use option.
